data.eml:eml: To the knowledge of Hedychridium Abeille de Perrin, 1879 (Hymenoptera: Chrysididae) of Mediterranean Region, with description of new species and new synonymy

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Strumia, Franco (2012): To the knowledge of Hedychridium Abeille de Perrin, 1879 (Hymenoptera: Chrysididae) of Mediterranean Region, with description of new species and new synonymy. Zootaxa 3548: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213923
